entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
